constructor-arg.name: command
constructor-arg.value: --class eu.stratosphere.procrustes.datagen.flink.FlinkIntGenerator ${app.path.datagens}/tamaras-msc-thesis-flink-datagens-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar "$(( "${system.default.config.parallelism.total}" / 2 ))" "$(( "${datagen.tuples.per.task}" * 2 ))" ${datagen.distribution} ${system.hadoop-2.path.input}/operatorstats/${datagen.path}

constructor-arg.name: command
constructor-arg.value: --class eu.stratosphere.procrustes.datagen.spark.SparkIntGenerator ${app.path.datagens}/tamaras-msc-thesis-spark-datagens-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar ${system.spark.config.defaults.spark.master} ${system.default.config.parallelism.total} ${datagen.tuples.per.task} ${datagen.distribution} ${system.hadoop-2.path.input}/operatorstats/${datagen.path}

constructor-arg.name: command
constructor-arg.value: -v -c eu.stratosphere.procrustes.experiments.operator.stats.FlatMap ${app.path.apps}/tamaras-msc-thesis-flink-jobs-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar ${system.hadoop-2.path.input}/operatorstats/${datagen.path} ${operator.stats.algorithm}

constructor-arg.name: config
constructor-arg.value: # common system parameters system.default.config.parallelism.total = 160 system.default.config.slaves = ${env.hosts.slaves.only20} # experiment parameters operator.stats.algorithm = none # datagen parameters datagen.path = 40B datagen.tuples.per.task = 250000000 datagen.distribution = "Uniform[100000]"
